existing_features.title: Update text colors throughout the application to ensure optimal contrast and readability, particularly for text overlays on background images (hero section, contact section, product cards)
Review and enhance text styling in the HeroSection component where text appears over the furnace background image, ensuring the gradient overlay provides sufficient contrast for white text
Enhance text visibility in the ContactSection component where the WhatsApp contact information appears over the refinery interior background image
Improve text contrast in ProductCard components, especially for product titles and purity badge text
Review and optimize text colors in the LiveRatesDashboard to ensure price displays, GST breakdown, and percentage changes are easily readable

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve text visibility with better color contrast
